features:
Unique, flexible hourglass design wraps around and compresses muscles while rolling
Slim handles make it easy to control and leverage pressure for targeting muscle knots
Foam spindles individually roll across muscles to provide a comfortable massage, while increasing circulation to improve mobility
Engineered for user controlled pressure to massage lower and upper body muscle groups, including calf, hamstring, quadriceps, and back
Easy and effective to use while seated or standing
Designed to relieve soreness, reduce muscle tightness, and speed muscle recovery post work out
Travel-friendly size at 19.5” L X 2.5” W and .75 lb
